Package ua.pp.ihorzak.alog

Class ALog

  • Object
    • ALog
  • public final class ALog
extends Object
    Simple customizable logger for Android. Can be customized with the help of ALogConfiguration instance which should be passed to initialize(ALogConfiguration). In most cases ALog should be initialized once in Application.onCreate() method. If it won't be initialized explicitly, it will be initialized on the first log method call with default configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize​(ALogConfiguration configuration)
        Initializes ALog with configuration. In most cases it should be called once in Application.onCreate() method.
        Parameters:
        configuration - ALogConfiguration instance. If null ALog is initialized with default configuration.

        public static ALogger t​(String tag)
        Gets ALogger instance with specified log tag.
        Parameters:
        tag - Log tag.
        Returns:
        ALogger instance with specified log tag.

      • st

        public static ALogger st​(int stackTraceLineCount)
        Gets ALogger instance which outputs specified count of stack trace lines with logging messages.
        Parameters:
        stackTraceLineCount - Count of stack trace lines to output with logging messages.
        Returns:
        ALogger instance which outputs specified count of stack trace lines with logging messages.

      • tst

        public static ALogger tst​(String tag,
                          int stackTraceLineCount)
        Gets ALogger instance which outputs specified count of stack trace lines with logging messages and uses specified log tag.
        Parameters:
        tag - Log tag.
        stackTraceLineCount - Count of stack trace lines to output with logging messages.
        Returns:
        ALogger instance which outputs specified count of stack trace lines with logging messages and uses specified log tag.

      • formatter

        public static ALogger formatter​(Class<?> clazz,
                                ALogFormatter<?> formatter)
        Gets ALogger instance which uses custom formatting for passed class instances with the help of passed ALogFormatter instance.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class of instances to be formatted with custom formatter.
        formatter - Custom formatter.
        Returns:
        ALogger instance which uses custom formatting for passed class instances with the help of passed ALogFormatter instance.

      • formatters

        Gets ALogger instance which uses custom formatting for passed classes instances with the help of passed ALogFormatter instances.
        Parameters:
        formatterMap - Map of classes and corresponding custom formatters.
        Returns:
        ALogger instance which uses custom formatting for passed classes instances with the help of passed ALogFormatter instances.
